dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S287 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich (for himself, Mr. Tester, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Pryor, and Mr. Boozman) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.header: Expansion of definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 2002(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking in section 103(a) of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11302(a)) and inserting in subsection (a) or (b) of section 103 of the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 11302).
